actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to exclude benefits of adopted disabled adult children from determinations of the family maximum.
short_title: Social Security for Adopted Disabled Adult Children Act of 2006
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security for Adopted Disabled Adult Children Act of 2006 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to exclude the monthly OASDI benefits of adopted disabled children from determinations of the family maximum of OASDI benefits for the month.

titles.title: Social Security for Adopted Disabled Adult Children Act of 2006
